label: Thesis Research
description: Researching and writing a thesis in consultation with a faculty adviser. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated. The M.A. program in Religious Studies allows students to receive a maximum of 8 hours for the M.A.
courseSectionInformation: Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated. The M.A. program in Religious Studies allows students to receive a maximum of 8 hours for the M.A.
